question: How do I update my business hours?
answer: Log into your dashboard at yourdocketonline.com, go to Settings > Business Info, and update your hours there. Changes typically take effect within a few minutes. Here's a guide: [link to guide]

question: How do I add or remove services?
answer: You can manage your services in your dashboard under Services. To add a new service, click 'Add Service' and fill in the details. To remove a service, go to the service and click 'Archive'. Need help? Contact us and we can assist.

question: How do I update my contact information?
answer: Your contact information can be updated in Settings > Contact Info. Make sure to save your changes. If you need to update your primary email address, please contact support as this may require verification.

question: How do I view my website analytics?
answer: Analytics are available in your dashboard under the Analytics section. You can view visitor statistics, popular pages, and more. Data is updated daily.

question: How do I request a website change?
answer: You can submit a change request through your dashboard under Support > Request Changes, or send us an email. We typically respond within 1-2 business days. For urgent changes, please contact us directly.

question: How do I reset my password?
answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page and enter your email address. You'll receive a password reset link. If you don't receive it, check your spam folder or contact support.

question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept all major credit cards and ACH transfers. You can update your payment method in Settings > Billing. All payments are processed securely.

question: How do I access my invoices?
answer: All invoices are available in your dashboard under Billing > Invoices. You can view, download, or print invoices at any time. Need a copy sent to a different email? Let us know.

question: How do I cancel my subscription?
answer: We're sorry to see you go. To discuss cancellation options, please contact Kayla directly. She can help with the process and answer any questions about your account.

question: How do I add photos to my website?
answer: You can upload photos through your dashboard under Content > Media Library. Supported formats are JPG, PNG, and WebP. For best results, images should be under 5MB. Need help optimizing images? We can assist.
